title: Architecture Design Session: Microsoft Foundry vs Copilot Studio with Private Endpoints
summary: Strategic architecture session to evaluate Microsoft Foundry and Copilot Studio platforms, design private endpoint implementation for secure enterprise AI deployment, and align on architectural approach for Test Customer's requirements.

agenda_items.description: Brief participant introductions. Overview of session goals and desired outcomes. Logistics and housekeeping.

Collaborative discovery of Test Customer's current AI platform architecture, use cases, and challenges. Focus on understanding requirements for private endpoints, data residency needs, security constraints, and business context for choosing between Microsoft Foundry and Copilot Studio.

agenda_items.topic: Microsoft Foundry vs Copilot Studio: Architecture Deep Dive
agenda_items.description: Detailed comparison of Microsoft Foundry and Copilot Studio architectures. Review capabilities, deployment models, integration patterns, and extensibility options. Focus on how each platform addresses enterprise AI scenarios and governance requirements.

Technical deep dive on implementing private endpoints for secure connectivity. Architecture patterns for network isolation, VNet integration, DNS configuration, and service endpoint policies. Whiteboarding session to design the optimal private endpoint architecture for Test Customer's specific requirements and constraints.
Review key takeaways from the session. Define next steps, action items with owners and timelines. Schedule follow-up sessions as needed.
